import React ,{ useState } from 'react' import Gallery05 from '../../assets/image/gallery/about-5.jpg' import Gallery06 from '../../assets/image/gallery/about-6.jpg' import Shapes03 from '../../assets/image/shapes/about-3.jpg' import Shapes01 from '../../assets/image/shapes/shape-1.png' import Iframe from 'react-iframe' function Introtwo() { const [video, setVideo] = useState(); return ( <>
Kevin Martin
setVideo(true)} >
Our introductions

Meet Mayor who Care About our City

Human Resources

Economic Data

We denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled demoralized charms of pleasure.

Aliquam viverra arcu. Donec aliquet blandit enim. Suspendisse id quam sed eros tincidunt luctus sit amet eu nibh egestas tempus turpis, sit amet mattis magna varius non.

Mayor Office
+92 (9800) 6869
{video && } ) } export default Introtwo
